Culture in the City of York

(Thumbnail credit The Jorvick Centre)

A Living Student Stereotype

I feel more like a student at home than I do in York.

Being a fresher is an experience hard to replicate, hard to leave and impossible to get back

It's an experience every uni student goes through and almost always regrets moving on - a growing experience that changes you completely, for better (or occasionally for worse!)
